qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: According to a study by Gartner, the global SaaS market is expected to reach 12.1 billion USD by 2014, reflecting a compound annual growth rate of 26%
qualitative_analysis.justification: Reporta crescimento significativo do mercado SaaS globalmente, demonstrando evolução e potencial de crescimento do modelo de negócio.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: The largest cluster (C1) makes up 57% of our sample...in C1 63% vendors considered no more than two components and 91% vendors considered no more than three
qualitative_analysis.justification: Demonstra padrões de estratégias de precificação entre fornecedores SaaS, com preferência por modelos compactos de licenciamento.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: Cluster two (C2) makes up 28% of our sample...Cluster three (C3) makes up 15% of our sample
qualitative_analysis.justification: Identifica segmentação de fornecedores entre estratégias baseadas em valor e custo, demonstrando diversidade de abordagens de precificação.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: Age of vendors <10 65...USA 63.2
qualitative_analysis.justification: Indica predominância de empresas jovens e forte concentração geográfica nos EUA no mercado SaaS.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: It is based on revenue sharing between three players, the content owner, a portal, and ourselves –all sharing the content revenue. If the content is [equivalent to] five dollars, we share it so that there are two dollars for the portal, and two dollars for the content owner, and one for us
qualitative_analysis.justification: Descreve modelo de compartilhamento de receita entre múltiplos stakeholders em plataforma, caracterizando modelo de marketplace.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: It became clear that 90 percent of our customers wanted to use this through a public cloud
qualitative_analysis.justification: Alta preferência por cloud pública demonstra aceitação do modelo de entrega baseado em nuvem e confiança dos clientes.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Transition to the Cloud: A Vendor Perspective
qualitative_analysis.quote: corporate IT spending on cloud computing will increase by 42% in 2015, and by year 2018, more than 60% of the companies will have at least half their software and infrastructure in cloud
qualitative_analysis.justification: Projeções indicam crescimento acelerado da adoção de cloud computing e transformação digital das empresas.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Transition to the Cloud: A Vendor Perspective
qualitative_analysis.quote: ERP Co adjusted their research and development resources to 80% in SaaS and 20% in on-premise...adjusted to 50% each for SaaS products and on-premise products
qualitative_analysis.justification: Demonstra transição estratégica de fornecedor tradicional para modelo híbrido, equilibrando investimentos entre SaaS e on-premise.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Transition to the Cloud: A Vendor Perspective
qualitative_analysis.quote: up to 50% of the initial ERP Co license fees do go to VAR
qualitative_analysis.justification: Revela impacto significativo nos parceiros de canal e transformação do modelo de receita durante transição para cloud.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Managing a Software Business
qualitative_analysis.quote: entering a mass market is hard; for example, more than two-thirds of the millions of mobile phone apps are never or hardly ever downloaded
qualitative_analysis.justification: Destaca desafios de penetração no mercado de massa de aplicativos móveis, relevante para estratégias de expansão.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Digital sustainable business models
qualitative_analysis.quote: 31 start-ups analyzed...Initial sample size 50 companies...various archetype classifications
qualitative_analysis.justification: Análise quantitativa de startups com foco em sustentabilidade, identificando diferentes arquétipos de modelos de negócio digitais sustentáveis.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: When does a freemium business model lead to high performance?
qualitative_analysis.quote: Share of freemium apps on Apple App Store 25 percent (2009)...80 percent (over) (2022)...App Store subscriptions 745 million (2021)...900 million (2022)
qualitative_analysis.justification: Evidencia crescimento explosivo do modelo freemium no mercado de apps, com aumento massivo de adoção e assinaturas.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Strategy and business model evolution at Adobe
qualitative_analysis.quote: Adobe reported a record $1.31 billion in revenue for the fourth quarter of 2015...record annual revenue of $4.8 billion in 2015. The recurring revenue from subscriptions represented 74% of Adobe's business
qualitative_analysis.justification: Caso exemplar de transição bem-sucedida para modelo de assinatura, com receita recorrente dominando o modelo de negócio.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Navigating the paradox of global scaling
qualitative_analysis.quote: global scaling firms to exhibit hypergrowth with a compound annual growth rate exceeding 40%...Total worldwide revenue for cloud-based software was estimated to be roughly $46 billion in 2017, growing at almost 20% a year
qualitative_analysis.justification: Métricas de hipercrescimento demonstram dinâmica acelerada de expansão global em modelos de negócio baseados em cloud.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Spillover Effects and Freemium Strategy in the Mobile App Market
qualitative_analysis.quote: the launch of the free version leads to an 8.9% increase in the daily number of ratings
qualitative_analysis.justification: Evidencia efeitos de spillover positivos do freemium, onde versão gratuita aumenta demanda pela versão paga através de efeitos de rede.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Systematic Literature Review of Monetization in Mobile App
qualitative_analysis.quote: the worldwide mobile market is expected to increase at a 13.8% compound annual growth rate (CAGR) between 2023 and 2030, reaching a value of USD 206.85 billion in 2022
qualitative_analysis.justification: Projeções de crescimento substancial do mercado mobile demonstram oportunidades contínuas de monetização.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Current practices and emerging trends of transit apps
qualitative_analysis.quote: About half of the transit agencies (N=115) developed or endorsed branded transit apps...about 15–50% of their tickets were sold via transit apps
qualitative_analysis.justification: Adoção significativa de apps de trânsito demonstra transformação digital do setor de transporte público.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Stuck Inside a Cloud: SaaS business models and public market valuation
qualitative_analysis.quote: The S&P 500 grew 136% in the three years while the SaaS companies grew on average 354% over the same period...The Sharpe ratio of the SaaS Index over the observed period is 4.269
qualitative_analysis.justification: Performance superior de empresas SaaS versus mercado tradicional evidencia valor e maturidade do modelo de negócio.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Managing Software-as-a-Service: Pricing and operations
qualitative_analysis.quote: Gartner (2021) predicts the revenue of worldwide software-as-a-service (SaaS) services reaching $145 billion by 2022 at a compound annual growth rate of 18.9% since 2020
qualitative_analysis.justification: Previsões de crescimento robusto do mercado SaaS global demonstram consolidação e expansão contínua do modelo.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Managing Software-as-a-Service: Pricing and operations
qualitative_analysis.quote: 38% of SaaS companies adopt pricing plans based on usage...Netflix's recommendation system saves the company $1 billion annually through reduced churn
qualitative_analysis.justification: Diversidade de estratégias de precificação baseadas em uso e valor significativo de retenção através de qualidade de serviço.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Converting free users to paid subscribers in the SaaS context
qualitative_analysis.quote: 12,297 prospective customers...734 conversions...On average, free-trial users convert to paid subscribers in 23 days, with a median of 9 days
qualitative_analysis.justification: Métricas de conversão de trials demonstram dinâmica de aquisição de clientes em modelo freemium SaaS.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Optimal distinctiveness across revenue models
qualitative_analysis.quote: Sample of 268,126 apps: 72,017 paid, 196,019 free...over a period of 18 months...cumulative revenue in excess of $200 billion
qualitative_analysis.justification: Análise massiva do mercado de apps revela predominância de apps gratuitos e receita substancial do ecossistema.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: On top of the game? Social features in freemium products
qualitative_analysis.quote: When the platform's installed base is large, free-to-play games with many social features have a 49 percentage points higher probability of becoming a superstar
qualitative_analysis.justification: Evidencia forte impacto de recursos sociais e efeitos de rede no sucesso de jogos freemium.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: MintM: the start-up transforming businesses real-time
qualitative_analysis.quote: revenues tripled soon thereafter...Successfully raising 750 USD K in various funding rounds...geographical presence in Brazil, India, Ireland, Malaysia, Singapore, UAE, and USA
qualitative_analysis.justification: Crescimento rápido e expansão geográfica demonstram escalabilidade de startup com modelo de negócio digital.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Business model innovation in mobile apps market
qualitative_analysis.quote: an expected global market bigger than 935 billion U.S. dollars in 2023...more than 2 million apps in the Google's Play store and 1.83 million apps in Apple's AppStore in 2019
qualitative_analysis.justification: Tamanho massivo do mercado de apps e projeções de crescimento indicam oportunidades contínuas para inovação em modelos de negócio.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The Business Case for a Journey Planning and Ticketing App
qualitative_analysis.quote: Active Users rose to a maximum of 92k...App Profitability is in fact more than £3k/month by month 60...monthly profit of between £14.5k and £140k in month 60
qualitative_analysis.justification: Modelagem de viabilidade demonstra potencial de lucratividade de app de transporte público com diferentes cenários de crescimento.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Hypothesis-driven Adaptation of Business Models based on Product Line Engineering
qualitative_analysis.quote: It was created for mobile applications and consists of 89 variation points of different business model decisions...we found different niches (31 decisions), which are currently not implemented by the analyzed competitors
qualitative_analysis.justification: Análise sistemática de pontos de variação em modelos de negócio móveis identifica oportunidades de nicho inexploradas.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: E-business evolution: an analysis of mobile applications' business models
qualitative_analysis.quote: the content category accounts for 80% (901 out of 1125) and 91.6% (1031 out of 1125), respectively, for the 'free' and 'pay per download' mobile apps' categories...about 69% of pay per download apps (777 out of 1125) are based on mixed value capture mechanisms
qualitative_analysis.justification: Predominância de modelos mistos de captura de valor demonstra sofisticação crescente de estratégias de monetização móvel.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Study on Cloud-Based Software Marketing Strategies Using Cloud Marketplace
qualitative_analysis.quote: As of January 2020, it has 65 registered services (KT Cloud)...Total 858 (CEART)...A total of 7213 services are registered (AWS marketplace)
qualitative_analysis.justification: Variação significativa no tamanho de marketplaces cloud demonstra diferentes níveis de maturidade e economias de escala.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Software as a service: Lessons from the video game industry
qualitative_analysis.quote: Video game revenues in the United States have nearly doubled, from USD 17.5 billion in 2010 to USD 29.1 billion in 2017...68% currently active GaaS players
qualitative_analysis.justification: Crescimento substancial de receita e alta taxa de jogadores ativos demonstram sucesso do modelo Games-as-a-Service.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The SaaS Payoff: Measuring the Business Value
qualitative_analysis.quote: SaaS accounts for the majority of the entire cloud market and it is forecast to reach $117.1 billion in revenues by 2021 with an annual growth rate of 16 percent
qualitative_analysis.justification: Previsões confirmam SaaS como componente dominante do mercado cloud com crescimento sustentado.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The SaaS Payoff: Measuring the Business Value
qualitative_analysis.quote: SaaS has enabled us to create a virtualised product which is 80% smaller, roughly 20 times faster...we can automatically provision new servers and create working environments for them within an hour
qualitative_analysis.justification: Benefícios técnicos e operacionais do SaaS demonstram eficiências significativas em infraestrutura e provisionamento.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Searching for synergy from a combination of heterogeneous business models
qualitative_analysis.quote: Impact values for market objectives: INT variables on VAR = 7.69 total, VAR variables on INT = 7.15 total...high synergy potential only in the market objective area
qualitative_analysis.justification: Análise quantitativa de sinergia entre modelos de negócio heterogêneos revela potenciais em objetivos de mercado.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Business Models for Emerging Technologies: The Case of Affective Computing
qualitative_analysis.quote: The global affective computing market was valued at USD 16.17 billion in 2017, and is expected to reach a value of USD 88.69 billion by 2023 at a CAGR of 32.81%
qualitative_analysis.justification: Taxa de crescimento excepcional demonstra potencial de tecnologias emergentes em criar novos modelos de negócio.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Economics of open source library software
qualitative_analysis.quote: The results of the study show that university libraries of India could save an estimated Rs 417m by adopting open source ILS
qualitative_analysis.justification: Economia substancial através de software open source demonstra viabilidade do modelo em setores específicos.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Making a Business Out of the Fog
qualitative_analysis.quote: New Fog services are expected to undergo a compound annual growth rate of around 119% in the years 2018–2022...is expected to potentially reach a market of more than $18 billion dollars worldwide by 2022
qualitative_analysis.justification: Crescimento explosivo projetado de fog computing demonstra emergência de novo modelo de infraestrutura cloud.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Synergies between App-Based Car-Related Shared Mobility Services
qualitative_analysis.quote: In P2P services, the platform charges a commission per trip, which in the case of Uber is 20%...BlaBlaCar's commission is around 17%...up to 25%, as in the case of Turo
qualitative_analysis.justification: Modelos de comissionamento em plataformas de mobilidade demonstram diferentes estratégias de captura de valor.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Open source ERP business model framework
qualitative_analysis.quote: OpenBravo...more than 970,000 downloads recorded...Compiere recorded more than 1.2 million downloads of its software and has more than 100 partners in 25 countries
qualitative_analysis.justification: Adoção massiva e rede de parceiros global demonstram viabilidade de modelo de negócio open source para ERP.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Analysis of Freemium Business Model Considering Network Externalities
qualitative_analysis.quote: in 2012, Alibaba handled 1.1 trillion yuan ($170 billion) in sales...Alibaba's market value was measured as $231 billion...As of August 2014, it had 848 million active QQ accounts
qualitative_analysis.justification: Escala massiva de usuários e transações demonstra poder de efeitos de rede em plataformas freemium.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Investigating e-business models' value retention for start-ups
qualitative_analysis.quote: We have collected data from 470 start-ups in China...95% of mobile Apps are abandoned by users within one month...China is by far world's largest IoT market with 74 million connections as of 2014
qualitative_analysis.justification: Alta taxa de abandono de apps destaca desafios de retenção de valor em modelos de negócio de startups móveis.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Growth of a platform business model as an entrepreneurial ecosystem
qualitative_analysis.quote: the supplier's OI level is 0.5 for Apple, while it is 0.9 for Google...customer OI, is 0.5 for the former and 0.9 for the latter
qualitative_analysis.justification: Diferenças em níveis de abertura entre plataformas Apple e Android impactam dinâmica do ecossistema.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Developing enterprise social software in China: insights from Mingdao
qualitative_analysis.quote: Sales revenue reached RMB2 million (US$285,700) and more than 90% of advanced account users renewed their account in 2014...about 5% of Mingdao's free accounts were upgraded to advanced accounts
qualitative_analysis.justification: Taxa de conversão de 5% e renovação de 90% demonstram eficácia do modelo freemium B2B empresarial.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Difficult Business Models of Digital Business Platforms for Health Data
qualitative_analysis.quote: The number of users in Satakunta region...grew from about 300 up to 3700...there were 15 EHR and other patient data providing systems providing patient data into the RHIS
qualitative_analysis.justification: Crescimento de usuários e integração de múltiplos sistemas demonstra desafios de viabilidade de plataformas de saúde.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Onboarding customer companies to electronic invoicing platform
qualitative_analysis.quote: the total number of invoices in Europe is estimated to have already surpassed 35 billion per year...e-invoicing enables cost savings of as high as 57% per invoice
qualitative_analysis.justification: Volume massivo de faturas e economias significativas demonstram proposta de valor de plataformas de faturamento eletrônico.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: How Service Offerings and Operational Maturity Influence the Viability of HIEs
qualitative_analysis.quote: 25-30 percent operational rate (2009-2012)...less than 26 percent financially viable (2012)...106 operational HIEs in 2014 with 50 percent financially viable
qualitative_analysis.justification: Melhoria de 26% para 50% em viabilidade financeira demonstra maturação do modelo de negócio de HIEs.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Mobile ticketing services in the Northern Europe
qualitative_analysis.quote: share of mobile ticketing remains rather low, for example, 3% of all sales at SL, 5% at Skånetrafiken, 7% at Västtrafik...The share of mobile tickets is more than 40% at Ruter, and it is constantly growing
qualitative_analysis.justification: Variação significativa em adoção (3-40%) demonstra diferentes estágios de maturidade em ticketing móvel.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The effect of free sampling strategies on freemium conversion rates
qualitative_analysis.quote: Premium users typically account for 3–5 % of total users...the odds of converting in Premiumfirst are 6.053 times the odds of converting in Freefirst
qualitative_analysis.justification: Diferença significativa em taxas de conversão baseada em estratégia de amostragem demonstra importância do design de freemium.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Give Away Your Digital Services: Leveraging Big Data to Capture Value
qualitative_analysis.quote: Facebook, for instance, had more than 1.7 billion monthly active users in September 2016...By the end of 2016, 2.16 billion people will have smartphones...90 percent of iOS apps are offered for free
qualitative_analysis.justification: Escala massiva de usuários e predominância de apps gratuitos demonstram modelo de monetização baseado em dados.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Making Digital Freemium Business Models a Success
qualitative_analysis.quote: Conversion rate 3.3% (Data set 1), 6.1% (Data set 2), 4.8% (Data set 3)...Top 1% users contribute 84.6% (data set 1), 60.5% (data set 2), 53.6% (data set 3) of total revenue
qualitative_analysis.justification: Concentração extrema de receita em poucos usuários (top 1% gera 53-85%) caracteriza dinâmica típica de freemium.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Understanding the influence of absorptive capacity and ambidexterity on business model change
qualitative_analysis.quote: Around 15% of the global cloud-computing market comprises Software as a Service (SaaS)...Cloud-turnover share: 20%...20%...10–20%
qualitative_analysis.justification: Diferentes níveis de participação de cloud no faturamento demonstram estágios variados de transição para SaaS.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Business models and opportunity creation: How IT entrepreneurs create business models
qualitative_analysis.quote: data collection for this study incorporated several types of empirical material covering the entire history of the case firm, from 2000 to 2014...Business model evolution stages: 4 major business models over 15 years
qualitative_analysis.justification: Evolução através de 4 modelos de negócio em 15 anos demonstra adaptação contínua sob incerteza tecnológica.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Revenue models, in-app purchase, and the app performance
qualitative_analysis.quote: the app market has shown an astonishing growth stepping from less than $10 billion annual revenue in 2011 up to estimated $70 billion by 2017...Apple's App Store and Google Play, which have become by far the most popular stores, retaining together almost 90% of the market
qualitative_analysis.justification: Crescimento de $10B para $70B em 6 anos e concentração de 90% em duas plataformas demonstra maturação do mercado.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Adjusting software revenue and pricing strategies in the era of cloud computing
qualitative_analysis.quote: Percentage of revenue: renting vs. licensing - Firm A: 70/30, Firm B: 100/0, Firm C: 55/45, Firm D: 20/80, Firm E: 100/0
qualitative_analysis.justification: Distribuição variada entre aluguel e licenciamento demonstra diferentes estratégias de transição de modelo de receita.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Designing business models for cloud platforms
qualitative_analysis.quote: revenue share (now 15%, instead of 30% before)...more than 200 BMI ideas...developing nine ideas further
qualitative_analysis.justification: Redução de revenue share de 30% para 15% demonstra ajuste de precificação para viabilizar ecossistema de plataforma.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Business Models for Cloud Computing: MSaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: In the CloudSME project MSaaS business models were developed iteratively using the input received from all stakeholders (24 companies)...five uses were identified each of which then served as the basis of a business model
qualitative_analysis.justification: Desenvolvimento iterativo com 24 empresas de 5 modelos de negócio MSaaS demonstra diversidade de aplicações cloud B2B.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: Based on 32 interviews with software professionals from four case firms...6–10 interviews per firm were conducted, each lasting 45–90 minutes
qualitative_analysis.justification: Estudo qualitativo profundo revela complexidade na seleção de modelos de receita e precificação para SaaS B2B.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Designing Viable Multi-sided Data Platforms
qualitative_analysis.quote: The app market is dominated by the freemium model as over 90% of all apps are for free...197 valid responses were received
qualitative_analysis.justification: Predominância de 90% de apps gratuitos confirma freemium como modelo dominante em plataformas móveis B2C.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Economic and business perspectives on smartphones as multi-sided platforms
qualitative_analysis.quote: By September 2012 about 700,000 apps were available on Apple's App Store and users had made roughly 35 billion app downloads. But Google Play was catching up — it had 675,000 apps available and 25 billion app downloads
qualitative_analysis.justification: Volume massivo de apps e downloads demonstra economias de escala e efeitos de rede em plataformas móveis multi-sided.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Crushing Candy: The Free-to-Play Game in Its Connective Commodity Form
qualitative_analysis.quote: the company's revenue grew from US$63 million in 2011 to US$1.8 billion in 2013...A mere 3% of its player network of over 300+ million consisted of payers
qualitative_analysis.justification: Crescimento explosivo com apenas 3% de pagantes demonstra eficácia do modelo free-to-play em jogos.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Effects of Freemium Strategy in the Mobile App Market
qualitative_analysis.quote: Of the 1,567 ranked paid applications, 1,020 (65.1 percent) offered a free version on Google Play...prices ranging from $0.99 to $39.95
qualitative_analysis.justification: Maioria de apps pagos (65%) oferecendo versão gratuita demonstra ubiquidade da estratégia freemium.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Network Externalities, Incumbent's Competitive Advantage and Software Start-Ups
qualitative_analysis.quote: The large majority (63.79 %) of the 918 firms answering the ELISS II survey...Above 70 % of them consider the diffusion of incompatible proprietary solutions as the main barrier
qualitative_analysis.justification: Barreiras de incompatibilidade para startups demonstram impacto de efeitos de rede e custos de mudança em software.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: According to a study by Gartner, the global SaaS market is expected to reach 12.1 billion USD by 2014, reflecting a compound annual growth rate of 26%...353 SaaS vendors...USA 63.2%
qualitative_analysis.justification: Crescimento de 26% CAGR e concentração de 63% nos EUA demonstram dinâmica geográfica do mercado SaaS.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The Impact of Open Source Software Commercialization on Firm Value
qualitative_analysis.quote: I computed the cumulative number of OSS product announcements to proxy for a firm's OSS product portfolio...490 firm-year (70 firms × 7 years) observations
qualitative_analysis.justification: Análise longitudinal de 70 empresas demonstra impacto da comercialização de open source no valor da firma.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The relationship between Open Innovation and Strategy
qualitative_analysis.quote: fifteen firms involved in OI initiatives were selected...forty-five face-to-face semi-structured interviews were held...very large and ambitious open collaboration with 41 partners
qualitative_analysis.justification: Colaboração com 41 parceiros demonstra complexidade de gestão de ecossistema em inovação aberta móvel.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Towards a better Understanding of PaaS Business Models
qualitative_analysis.quote: we identified the main design elements of PaaS business models as well as their relationships by investigating 24 PaaS providers
qualitative_analysis.justification: Análise de 24 provedores PaaS revela elementos de design e relacionamentos em modelos de negócio de plataforma cloud.
